name: Beverley Barker
reviews: This book offers a refreshing perspective and representation of Vampires and Shapeshifters.It offers comfort with the aspects of rain, darkness (the blue tint) and mystery.

name: Harmon Shepard
reviews: I love twilight in a way that I have never loved a story in my entire life.the story is just brilliant.The love in this story between two people is just indiscribable,but the bad thing is that there isn't that love in reality

name: Delaney Carpenter
reviews: This is one of those books that can be reread millions of time. A supernatural theme with a perfect blend of romance makes it one of the best young adult fantasy fiction novel.

name: Veronica Craig
reviews: This is one of the best books ever read ...go ahead and try this. It has quite simple vocabulary easy to understand .every thing seems like a roller coaster ride, so amazing

name: Weaver Pittman
reviews: I'm totally obsessed With the twilight series. A story of  a human girl and a vampire who'll love each other beyond eternity. Everything in the book is beautifully described that you can visualize every single details as if you are living through it .

name: Jake Bob
reviews: Twilight is basically the best book I have ever came across. The story is so beautiful that every time I read it I fall for it all over again. The scenes are sweetly romantic and it makes us feel the dreams comes true.
